entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
